title: Nerf Qiyana please so strong champion
body: So guys i think Qiyana is not balanced because she is 1 shoting me on lvl 2 with {{summoner:4}}  QWQ{{summoner:14}}. You can't trade her she is 1 shoting you and have so much AOE damage. She has stun(2x) her R can activate in river and walls (so broken in hte jg) and she is 1 shoting every adc after second or first item i don't know what to say but just remove her or nerf her ty

replies.body:
She's not doing that. It's mathematically impossible for her to kill you at that level from full health. 

What probably happened is she poked you down with her Q level one, you took bad trades while tanking minions, then she all-in'd you.
I dunno. She's pretty squishy. You sure you can't kill her?
